author: Kunal Purohit
title: India COVID-19 lockdown means no food, no work for rural poor
description: Millions in underdeveloped regions face penury and deprivation as economic activity grounds to a halt due to lockdown.
content:
Mumbai, India - For farm worker Manisha Uke, being able to survive is contingent on two factors - one, getting a daily wage of 100 Indian rupees ($1.3) a day and two, receiving a widow's monthly pension of 1,000 rupees ($13.1) from the government. 
Since the… [+7852 chars]
